message: Let's start with this. A fair deal for both of us.
Your turn Alice. I think this is more representative of the opportunity cost for both of us as the game goes on.
I understand the time pressure, Bob, but this needs to be fair for both of us. This is my final offer.
Alice, let's be realistic. This is the last round where an agreement makes us both better off than if we just walk away.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option.
